title: Home on The Range
lyrics: Where the deer and the antelope play. Where seldom is heard a discouraging word And the skies are not cloudy all day.
Where the deer and the antelope play. Where seldom is heard a discouraging word And the skies are not cloudy all day.
With the lights from the glittering stars Have I stood there amazed, asked as I gaze? If their glory exceeds that of ours.
Like a maid in a heavenly dream. CHORUS
